name: Habit Coffee & Bakeshop, The
text:
The Habit Coffee Menu

Espresso (2oz): $3.50
Americano (8/12oz): $3.50

Varieties: English Breakfast, Earl Grey, Chai, Sweet Orange Ceylon, Green Sencha, Mint, Ginger Lime, Vanilla Cream Rooibos, Honeybush Cinnamon
